country.query: SELECT ?city ?cityLabel ?country ?countryLabel ?image WHERE {    ?city wdt:P31 wd:Q515.    ?city wdt:P17 ?country.   OPTIONAL { ?city wdt:P18 ?image. } SERVICE wikibase:label {  bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]".   } }ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT ?limit

question.en: Which country does this image belong to?

famous_people.query: SELECT ?person ?personLabel ?image WHERE { ?person wdt:P31 wd:Q5. ?person wdt:P18 ?image. ?person wdt:P106 ?occupation. VALUES ?occupation { wd:Q33999 wd:Q937857 wd:Q82955 wd:Q36180 wd:Q188146 wd:Q49757 wd:Q3282637 wd:Q82913 wd:Q937 wd:Q901 } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } } ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT ?limit
